channel.title: listing whonix inside tools/programs
channel.description:
i think its better to c the essential changes of what to remove or not to remove inside whonix for now or later , if we list what is inside whonix. similarly to [kali tools.](http://tools.kali.org/tools-listing)
and i think this will ease&solve something like these topics:-
- https://forums.whonix.org/t/whonix-delete-the-unnecessary-files-programs/1905
- https://forums.whonix.org/t/xchat-outdated-app-still-considered-safe-to-use/1647
something also like this:-
https://github.com/Whonix/whonix-developer-meta-files/blob/master/package_documentation/Whonix-Shared_packages
but instead of the packages , we replace it witha programs.

item.title: listing whonix inside tools/programs
item.dc:creator: TNT_BOM_BOM
item.description:
no need to maintain , just onetime post. only names of the tools.

i can fill the tools with many useable information if i just has the table of tools. the problem i cant know how many tools and their names inside whonix.

but if u r saying that knowing the names of the tools is taking effort , then in case i cant help.

Read full topic

item.description:

item.title: listing whonix inside tools/programs
item.dc:creator: TNT_BOM_BOM
item.description:
i think its better to c the essential changes of what to remove or not to remove inside whonix for now or later , if we list what is inside whonix. similarly to kali tools.

and i think this will ease&solve something like these topics:-

  • whonix delete the unnecessary files/programs

  • Xchat outdated app still considered safe to use?

something also like this:-

github.com

Whonix/whonix-developer-meta-files/blob/master/package_documentation/Whonix-Shared_packages

#######################

#######################

## build-steps.d/1100_prepare-build-machine

##################

but instead of the packages , we replace it witha programs.
